img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas .png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Five_Skandhas_.png)
With all five in your inventory, go to Xu Dog and deliver the Skandhas. You'll then have the option to tell Xu Dog to make the Five Skandhas Pill. Receiving this will boost your health, mana, and stamina.
img_below_text:
Now it's time to head back to almost where you fought the Son of Stones. We mentioned earlier the clearing with the water and the big rock with golden trees on either side. Instead of going right, where you fought the Giant Shigandang, you now want to go left.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(145\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2b/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28145%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Five Skandhas .png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Five_Skandhas_.png)
With all five in your inventory, go to Xu Dog and deliver the Skandhas. You'll then have the option to tell Xu Dog to make the Five Skandhas Pill. Receiving this will boost your health, mana, and stamina."
        - Following Text: "Now it's time to head back to almost where you fought the Son of Stones. We mentioned earlier the clearing with the water and the big rock with golden trees on either side. Instead of going right, where you fought the Giant Shigandang, you now want to go left.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(145\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2b/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28145%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scenic area in a forested valley with rocky cliffs, where the player character is hovering on a cloud, preparing to move in the direction indicated by a red arrow. The arrow points toward a path on the left side of the screen, guiding players to proceed in that direction. This image serves as a visual cue in the walkthrough to help players navigate toward the next objective after delivering the Five Skandhas to Xu Dog.
